title: Game wont Install
body: I am trying to install LOL and everytime it scans the files and gets stuck at 33% tried reinstalling multiple times as well

replies.body: At this point in the process, the patcher has to download game files and apply them.  It seems that a connection issue is blocking that from happening, so your best bet would be to go over the steps found in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
